mapper.select: select u.*,d.district as resName from user_table u, district_table d where level=2 and d.d_id=u.regional_id
select u.*,t.township as resName from user_table u, township_table t where level=3 and t.t_id=u.regional_id
select u.*,r.resettlement_point as resName from user_table u, resettlement_point_table r where level=4 and r.r_id=u.regional_id
select u.*,c.city_name as resName from user_table u, city c where level=0 or level=1 and c.ci_id=u.regional_id

select * from user_table P left join resettlement_point_table R on P.regional_id=R.r_id left join township_table T on R.township_id=T.t_id left join district_table D on T.district_id=D.d_id left join city Ci on D.city_id=Ci.ci_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
